name: SERVICE_BENEFIT_BUCKET
description:
This table stores benefit bucket information relevant to or caused by AP Claim service lines.





To link this tableï¿½s service line information back to a claim header, join this table to AP_CLAIM_PROC_IDS on the TX_ID column. If you need to report on claim service lines specific to Cost Sharing Reduction (CSR), join this table instead to AP_CLAIM_PROC_IDS_CSR on the TX_ID column.

columns.name: TX_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the AP Claim procedure transaction.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: BENEFIT_BUCKET_ID
columns.description: Stores the unique identifier of the benefit bucket affected by this service.

columns.name: BENEFIT_BUCKET_MAX
columns.description: Stores the maximum number of units allowed for this benefit bucket level.

columns.name: BENEFIT_BUCKET_USED
columns.description: Stores the number of units used for this benefit bucket level.

columns.name: BENEFIT_BCKT_REMAIN
columns.description: Stores the number of units remaining for this benefit bucket level.

columns.name: BUCKET_LEVEL
columns.description: Stores the benefit bucket level used.

columns.name: BENEFIT_BUCKET_COMPUTED
columns.description: The original amount that the system computed to be accumulated to the bucket.

columns.name: ROLL_PRD_STR
columns.description: The roll period that the benefit bucket accumulation used.
